revised_title: Pulsars and Their Impact on Physics
tldr: This article discusses the relationship between pulsars and various sub-disciplines of physics, highlighting their significance in advancing our understanding of high-energy nuclear physics, relativistic plasma physics, and other areas. Pulsars have been used as signal generators, probes of extreme physical conditions, and even as potential time standards. The author also touches upon the impact of pulsars on fluid dynamics, binary stars, and supernova research.
